name: Ewan Morgan
story: John Thomson has served in the military for over 20 years, having joined as soon as he turned 18. He has always been a skilled marksman and has worked hard to get to his current rank of Sergeant. He is married with two children, a son and a daughter, and is fiercely protective of his family. Despite being in his 40s, he is still physically fit and continuously aims to improve himself.
